code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Link,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import VideoLibrary from'./components/VideoLibrary';import AddEditVideo from'./components/AddEditVideo';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchVideos();},[]);const fetchVideos=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/.netlify/functions/getVideos');const data=await response.json();setVideos(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching videos:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Video Library"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/add",children:"Add New Video"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VideoLibrary,{videos:videos,onUpdate:fetchVideos})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/add",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddEditVideo,{onSave:fetchVideos})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/edit/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddEditVideo,{videos:videos,onSave:fetchVideos})})]})]})});};export default App;
